availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elisha Low (Mercer County, Kentucky, shoemaker and jailer.)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, shoemaker and jailer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Low. Father of Minerva Low, Hannah Low, Benjamin Low, Sarah Low, and Mary E. Low. Shoemaker in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Jailer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 347B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 713.
